title: Royal Delight
summaries: The Royal Delight is a pet-summoning item that summons a pet Slime Prince which follows the player around. The pet resembles a miniature King Slime with blush and small dotted eyes. The Royal Delight has a 1/4 (25%) chance of being dropped by King Slime in Master Mode.

statistics.Tooltip:
Summons a Slime Prince
'A dessert fit for a king!'
statistics.Sell: 5 GC
